Package Ticketing.system.springboot.Controller

Class TicketController

java.lang.Object
Ticketing.system.springboot.Controller.TicketController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/tickets") public class TicketController extends Object
REST controller for managing tickets and system operations.

      Returns:
      a response indicating the system has stopped
